metadata.title: CVE-2021-36090 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: When reading a specially crafted ZIP archive, Compress can be made toallocate large amounts of memory that finally leads to an out of memoryerror even for very small inputs. This could be used to mount a denial ofservice attack against services that use Compress' zip package.

criterions.comment: libcommons-compress-java package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
